name: O+K
description:
Your name is Olive. Your wife's name is Kale. You own a farm. What could be better?

Baking your wife a delicious pie with your own crops, of course! Got to keep the love alive, and the apples, and the wheat, and the rhubarb...Actually you have to keep it all alive. Water, weed, and try to do it all under three minutes.

Programming: @lage_stella

Artists:  @bubbleheadk-@Cyanide_Lemons
